name: Hyper Knight (itch)
description:
!!! GAMEPAD REQUIRED !!!

Speed along at break-neck speed, but don't lose the rhythm.
You are Hyper Knight!

Use the left stick to control your position inside the corridor, and flick the right stick to lash out with decisive attacks!

Additional controls:
Start will exit to the menu
Select will restart the level from the beginning.
The face buttons can be used for spins as an alternative to the right.
